title: B&B Viale San Pietro in Sassari: Find Hotel Reviews, Rooms, and Prices on Hoteles.com
description: View deals for B&B Viale San Pietro, including fully refundable rates with free cancellation. Clinica Malattie Infettive is minutes away. This guesthouse offers free WiFi. All rooms have flat-screen TVs and free toiletries.
